name: Keres' Shop
description:
This is a game about a blob named Keres learning how to manage their own shop. You will help them pick out the foods, the pastries, and the drinks to give to the customers. You earn the currency of "Flowers 💐" instead of "Money 💰".

Controls:

Up - Up Arrow / W
Down - Down Arrow / S
Left - Left Arrow / A
Right - Right Arrow / D
A - Alt / Z / J
B - Ctrl / K / X
Start - Enter
Select - Shift

Extremely Important Notes:

  • This game is cancelled. I will no longer work for this game anymore unless I miraculously find a lot of motivation.
  • This game was supposed to be for my close friends, so I'll give you a bit of context:
    • A "Blob" is an animal that has turned from a little slime ball baby.  They are very affectionate, cute beings that need love and care from others.
    • These blobs live in a world called "BlobsWorld".
    • The currency in their world are called flowers not cash.
    • Jayden and Kayden are twin brothers.
    • Keres is a shop owner of "Keres' Shop". 
    • Keres' pronouns are "They/Them"
  • There are shaking movements of the screen.
  • I got the background music from this reddit guy here.
  • Lastly, have fun!
